markdown:
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 317 4.0 **Tradition** [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Cast** [material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) --- You use your occult lore and the power of your mind to manipulate the spiritual multiverse, resulting in any of the following effects:
  • Duplicate any spell from the [occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1) list of 9th level or lower to which you have access.
  • Duplicate any spell from another spell list of 7th level or lower. It must be common or you must have access.
  • Produce any effect whose power is equivalent to any occult spell 9th level or lower, or non-occult spell 7th level or lower.
  • Reverse certain effects that refer to the [_wish_](/Spells.aspx?ID=377) spell
At the GM's discretion, you can try to produce greater effects, but this is dangerous and the spell may have only a partial effect.
name: Alter Reality

summary_markdown: Warp reality to duplicate occult spells.
text: Alter Reality Source Core Rulebook pg. 317 4.0 Tradition Occult Cast Three Actions material, somatic, verbal --- You use your occult lore and the power of your mind to manipulate the spiritual multiverse, resulting in any of the following effects: Duplicate any spell from the occult list of 9th level or lower to which you have access. Duplicate any spell from another spell list of 7th level or lower. It must be common or you must have access. Produce any effect whose power is equivalent to any occult spell 9th level or lower, or non-occult spell 7th level or lower. Reverse certain effects that refer to the wish spell At the GM's discretion, you can try to produce greater effects, but this is dangerous and the spell may have only a partial effect.
